description:
Beachside Opportunity
The opportunity of a lifetime to build your dream home on a massive block of approximately 1,300 square metres could now be a reality. With plenty of room for a pool, tennis court and boat storage this is your chance to create an affordable lifestyle property. Set in a quiet court surrounded by other quality homes this really is a rare find. Within walking distance to the town centre and only minutes from the beach, now is the time to buy. Contact our office now for further details.

1 FLAT ACRE/ WALK TO THE BEACH
HUGE PRICE REDUCTION TO SELL!!!!!!
This beautifully presented North facing home is just a gem within walking distance to the off lease dog beach. If you interested in fishing the pier and Corinella boat ramp are just 700m away. (see included pics) If you are seeking a lifestyle property you need to inspect this one on approx 1 acre. This home offers 4 spacious bedrooms. The master bedroom has his and hers WIRs and full ensuite. The main bathroom includes a bath and separate shower. The home has been refurbished including a NEW kitchen with ss SMEG dishwasher, glass splashback, double door cavity for the fridge, 900mm SMEG 5 burner stove, fanforced oven with matching rangehood. The kitchen is open plan overlooking the dining and sitting area that is filled with natural light and an open fire. Ducted heating, refridgerated air conditioning and Coonara style heater will take care of climate control. The lounge has external security roller blinds fitted to keep the area cool in summer. The floor coverings have all been replaced with either new carpet, tiles or floating flooring. There is a second living zone to kick back and relax with glass sliding door leading to the wide rear verandah perfect for entertaining guests. The deck overlooks the expansive grounds and fernery.
Heaps of room to build a huge shed STCA. The backyard has established shady trees, an orchard, veggie garden, sundry shedding and even enough room for the pony. The home has recently been freshly painted throughout, rewired, re-plumbed and has had a new colorbond roof fitted. Most of the hard work is done.
This home is situated in a prime position within walking distance to beaches, the local store, lawn bowls and public transport. Easy access to the freeway should you need to commute to work.
Disclaimer-we have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however-we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers / leasees are advised to carry out their own investigations.

Built for family, fun and entertaining
Surrounded by quality homes in a prestigious estate, this modern family home will surely impress. As good as new, it includes 4 generous bedrooms plus study, master with WIR and full ensuite. The stunning kitchen is designed for the cooking enthusiast and has quality stone bench tops, soft close drawers, LED down lights and gas cooking. The huge living area opens onto the spacious alfresco which is perfect for outdoor entertaining. Other features include a studio, undercover spa and double car garage. Positioned only minutes from the school, shops and transport. Be quick to secure this amazing home in a fantastic location.

address: Unit 14/1005 Bass Highway The Gurdies VIC 3984
description:
LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING AT ITS BEST
Upgraded 2 bedroom unit up for grabs with the bedrooms being spacious and both with built in robes.
Upgraded kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher with range hood.
Combined and upgraded bathroom, toilet and laundry all in one, the space has been utilized very well.
Open plan kitchen, meals and dining with air conditioning reverse cycle heating and coonara.
Fully enclosed outdoor area for the summer BBQÃ¢s coming up or have a wine watching the water and amazing sunsets from the front verandah.
Body corp involved, 1 car park for you and a big carpark for visitors.
Call today to book your private inspection.

STUNNING FAMILY HOME ON A WIDE BLOCK
This home is an eye-catcher with its modern street appeal and on trend interior layout. The single storey four-bedroom family home is situated on a 543sqm flat parcel of land with a double garage, also including side access through double gates into the yard which creates extra parking space for the boat and/or caravan.
Step inside and discover a well-presented interior that features a mix of large square tiles and carpet, high ceilings create an airy living environment, while the spacious light filled open plan kitchen dining area opens up via a glass sliding door out to the alfresco and the backyard. Good quality stainless-steel appliances in the well-appointed kitchen, which includes a dishwasher and plenty of bench space.
Master suite is situated to the front of the home with the rest of bedrooms and main bathroom to the rear. Side access from the laundry to the landscaped side yard which is set up neat and tidy with hot water unit, gas cylinders and clothesline.
Contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection today on 56788433

ATTENTION FIRST HOME BUYERS - NEW BUILD!
This home does not disappoint, offering a much sought after 20m wide frontage block on approx 625 square metres, double driveway, double garage, room for access to the rear for your boat or caravan - This property is ripe for the first home buyer, retiree or investor alike!
AW Homes have built this new home which fits the local market perfectly offering entry to wide hallway which leads to the master suite including feature windows, shower ensuite and separate walk in robe. Stepping through to the rear light filled kitchen, dining and family room you will enjoy the aspect out to the rear garden. A separate guest wing houses two further bedrooms with built in robes, separate bathroom, separate toilet and laundry with rear access.
The home has been well decorated with neutral finishes throughout, making the most of the natural light on offer. It's a quick walk to the local shops, Grantville pier, the bus stops and is in an established area of the estate.
This home is currently under construction and ready for your inspection! Contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today on 5678 8433

BIG BEAUTY ON BAY ROAD!
This property won't last long! Get in quick to inspect this Big Beauty on Bay Road, Jam Jerrup. This property is sitting on approximately 1 acre of relatively flat land. It comes with a HUGE 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom home which has 3 living zones! An alfresco area, water tanks, lock up work shop/garage with concrete floor. The yard to the rear is massive, and you can see the water through the understorey of the tree canopy to the rear boundary!
If you are keen for a BIG home on a BIG parcel of land then you need to make time this weekend to inspect this fantastic value property!
Contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection on 5678 8433.

Excellent Position with Great Potential
This spectacular private allotment positioned in Corinella poses an excellent opportunity to build your ideal coastal home or investment properties subject, STCA.
Comprised of approximately 2440m with access from Smythe Street. Pleasantly vegetated with established trees, the property offers plenty of scope for design.
This pristine parcel close to Corinella Jetty, General Store, and walking tracks puts you in a prime position to soak up the magic of this seaside location
The garage site has had the earthworks done and plans are available on request, town water is connected to the property, power cabling and stormwater piping are installed to the garage site.

2.5 Acres Ideally Located
Set on a whopping 2.5 acres, and right in the township of Lang Lang this property is a smart move for many buyer. If you're wanting some extra space with the convenience to walk to town, or you're an investor looking to develop (STCA) then this is a great opportunity. The home is solid and neat with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living areas, a huge outdoor entertaining are and some great shedding it will tick all the boxes.
The home itself is neat and functional, and big enough for a family, with an open plan kitchen, dining room, plus 2 separate living areas. The kitchen is spacious and bright, with ample bench space and storage and features a 600mm free-standing stove and dishwasher.
The home has 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite and all bedrooms have built-in robes. Both living areas have wood-fire heating and fans, as well as split system heating/cooling in the home.
Outside is a huge outdoor entertaining area, fully enclosed for year-round comfort. 2 big sheds have enough room to store all the toys and cars - both with concrete floors, lights and power.
All set on a big 2.5 acre block (with a dam at the back) with wide frontage. The home is ideally positioned with plenty of options for further subdivision, or enjoy the 2.5 acres with the family, horses or animals and still be able to walk to the shops, school, kinder, doctor and everything else Lang Lang has to offer.
The possibilities are endless!
Please Note: Photo ID is required for all inspections.

RENOVATED FAMILY HOME IN TENBY POINT
The hard work has been completed and this wonderful family home is move in ready!
This ranch style property features a North facing verandah running the length of the home and is situated on a large block of 1,382m2 with mature trees, abundant birdlife, plenty of storage space with a large lock up garage with workshop, fully lined lockable bungalow/shed with its own solar power and an open front woodshed to the rear. A great sized fernery and a concrete covered patio finish off the rear yard with the large family entertainer in mind..
Internally the home has had many improvements including fresh paint, new floor coverings throughout, brand new central kitchen with long breakfast bar, new roll down blinds and updated fixtures and fittings. Open plan living spaces include space for the family to spread out and sit around the coonara. Three bedrooms are all a great size with the large master bedroom (or second lounge) being positioned at the end of the home. The house has the growing family at its heart and includes the extras like tv points in all rooms, built in speakers to the ceiling throughout including a couple outside the house as well. It is a must-see property and we bet it will tick a lot of boxes on your ideal home list.
Tenby Point is a small Victorian rural township located along the Bass Coast and is approximately 80kms from Melbourne city. This makes Tenby Point the ideal location for a family home close to other small idyllic towns or a holiday home to hideaway on the weekends with Corinella boat ramp only 5 minutes away, and a short stroll to the end of the street to drop a line in at Westernport Bay.
Please contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff today to arrange your inspection on 5678 8433!

Affordable Seaside Lifestyle!!
On the high side of the road with views to Western Port Bay sits this 3 bedroom, fully fenced property with open plan living.
The kitchen has been updated with stainless steel appliances, electric cooking, handy pot drawers, dishwasher and walk in pantry. The timber flooring flows through to the dining and lounge area, creating an atmosphere of warmth and continuity. A heating/cooling split system helps keep desired temperatures all year round and the large windows bring in lots of natural light.
There are three bedrooms all with ceiling fans and built in robes, the master has room for a future ensuite and has sliding door access to the deck. The laundry and bathroom have been cleverly designed to save space yet still allow for plenty of room with lots of storage, large shower and a modern double vanity.
Outside to the front of the house is a full width, partly covered deck offering views to the bay, and stairs leading down to a substantial fully fenced yard containing fruit trees, lawn and mature palm trees adding a touch of tropical. Out to the rear of the house is some more decking, and a large lockable shed with concrete flooring and power. There is plenty of room under the house for storage and potential separate living or man cave with windows and a connected second toilet. The home has been freshly painted and is waiting for new owners to move in and enjoy the lifestyle that this area has to offer. Within walking distance to the water and local amenities at Grantville including cafes, chemist, post office, permanent doctor, hardware store and more. The dual lane Bass Highway is close, making the commute to CBD easy, and famous Phillip Island with all its attractions is only 25 minutes away.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 2027

BE ONE WITH NATURE
A native sanctuary on a large 1332m2 block (approx) be surrounded by wild flowers allowing you to regularly escape to the country.
A well treed property supplying you with all the shade you need to escape the hot summer days with peace and quiet. Every window to the home offers you its own garden outlook.
Privately hidden from the road discover an amazing down to earth vibe home consisting of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has a walk through robe into the full ensuite.
Spacious open plan timber kitchen, meals and lounge offering views of rural landscapes and Westernport Bay popular for its fishing. This area of the home has lovely tiled floors with a wood heater and split system reverse cycle unit. The kitchen offers a dishwasher and stainless steel oven. Family friendly layout!
Outside you can have a BBQ on the decked area, sip a wine admiring the natural landscapes including waterviews of the bay and watch the world go by. Garden shed and carport included.
If you love the bush surrounds, and appreciate peace and quiet, this home could be for you.
Easy commute to Wonthaggi, Phillip Island, Pakenham and Cranbourne for all your amenities.
Call today.

THIS MIGHT NOT BE YOUR FIRST RODEO, BUT IT'S YOUR FIRST IN RODEO...
"Build your dream home in Lang Lang's newest estate."
It's titled and ready for you to begin building tomorrow. With a 17-metre frontage and a whipping 41-metre depth, the block in total is just under 700sqm (698sqm approx).
The fully-fenced bock is located in the Summerfields Estate and is walking distance from Lang Lang's main strip of shops plus Lang Lang Primary School.
Ride on in Rodeo Drive.

Country Style Living At Its Finest, With Room For The In-Laws.
(1P3076) Set on 2.5 acres amongst larger acreage allotments is this spectacular lifestyle property offering a massive 4 bedroom home full of quality & character,
and designed for big family living in mind and with a great sense of warmth. Boasting a plethora of features such as;
- Spacious 4 bedroom family home with 2 complete kitchens for dual family living.
- Approx. 39.5sqs of living.
- 2 x master bedrooms, both with full ensuites and WIR's.
- Bedrooms 2 and 3 are double rooms and with BIR's.
- Both kitchens are hostess style and offer great views from their windows.
- High ceilings throughout, 3 large living areas, one featuring a sunken floor and two with wood fire places.
- School bus stop directly across the road from the front of the property.
- Solar power and heat transfer system for optimum energy sufficiency.
- Storage/craft room under roofline, plus a separate workshop and 2 x double car carports.
- Fenced to 2 paddocks with water and hot wire, large side yard, back entertaining area & manicured gardens.
This property represents true versatility and country style living at its best. As soon as you walk through the front door you get a great sense of warmth that just makes you feel right at home.
Perfect for entertaining, or someone with a large family (or two) and or someone with a couple of horses Whatever your needs may be, they are sure to be met here.
For all enquiries & inspections please Call Jason Brown Direct.

address: LOT 134/NO 6 ANNIE AVENUE Lang Lang VIC 3984
description:
READY, SET, BUILD
Exciting new residential subdivision in the vibrant town of Lang Lang.
640m2 block is priced to sell! Titled land ready to build your new home today. Fully serviced land with underground power, natural gas, town water, NBN and sewerage.
Lang Lang offers an opportunity to live the country lifestyle with great schools, medical facilities and a comfortable drive to beaches and many tourist destinations.

170 Metres to Beach Boardwalk!!!
Sitting pretty behind a picket fence is this immaculate home in Pioneer Bay, only a hop, skip and jump away from the coastline of Westernport Bay.
The property is well maintained from the front gate through to the back fence that overlooks peaceful acreage. Two sides of the house are covered by an enclosed veranda and the front porch is just perfect for an early morning cuppa while you enjoy the rose garden. Stepping inside youll find an open plan design that is both practical and welcoming. The kitchen is well set out with stainless steel gas cooking, range hood, plenty of storage space and the adjoining meals area has a lovely bay window feature. Tucked away behind space saving bi-fold doors is an office off the side of the lounge. There are ceiling fans throughout, two heating/cooling split systems and double glazed windows, ensuring the home is at desired temperatures all year round.
The 2 bedrooms are carpeted and have good size built in robes, and large windows to let in the natural light. In addition to the ample storage space in the laundry there are two linen cupboards, youll be wanting to buy things to fill them!!
Outside has plenty of undercover parking plus an extra bay with high clearance for the caravan or boat. There also a fantastic, solid two storey studio with colorbond roofing, concrete flooring and power. Downstairs would make the perfect man-cave and upstairs is ideal for extra guests or a craft room.
With an expansive concrete driveway, low maintenance gardens, solar panels, garden shedding and attached water tanks all included, there is nothing else to do but move in and start enjoying this well-loved property straight away.
The foreshore boardwalk and coastline are literally at the end of the road, and Grantville is a mere three minutes drive away offering Cafes, Bakery, Post Office, Chemist, Doctor, Ambulance Depot., local Hardware and Service Station.
The dual lane Bass Highway nearby makes commuting easy to either the CBD in 90 mins or San Remo and Phillip Island in 20 mins. Major shopping centres within half an hour in either direction.
Additional Features: Filtered tank water to kitchen; 12 Solar Panels; Crim Safe Security Doors; Window locks on all windows; Fully fenced with two gate entry to rear yard
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 2026

Sophistication, and Exceptional Liveability
Conveniently located in one of Corinellas most prestigious streets and amongst all Corinella has to offer for the best lifestyle lies this two-story residence of utter sophistication, and exceptional liveability.
A modern classic with stunning Western Port Bay views from the deck. Ideal for indoor/outdoor living, with the generous entertaining area on the upstairs deck and at the rear of the property.
The open plan layout provides space and comfort with two living areas, including a family room downstairs that opens out to the entertaining deck and garden. Four bedrooms all with BIRs & 3 of them share a large central bathroom, separate toilet, and large laundry downstairs.
The master upstairs has a walk-in - robe and ensuite. The kitchen offers exceptional quality and detail throughout, with modern appliances, breakfast bar the entire space is both functional and aesthetically pleasing.
The home also offers-Remote garage x 2 cars, Large shed for boat or caravan with access from Smythe Street, so offering rear access to the property, the property is fully fenced and land size approx 655m2.
This property offers a tranquil escape and an enviable lifestyle moment from the spectacular walking tracks, parks, schools, boat ramp and more, it is a place youll be proud to call home.
Please call Tamara or Daniel for an inspection.
Please note: photo ID is required for all inspections

A-Frame Cottage/Enchanting Outlook!!!
At the end of a no through road and tucked in amongst natural surrounds is this gorgeous A-Frame style home, yet only minutes to the waters of Western Port Bay.
Imagine relaxing on the deck and watching the dragonflies and birds forage near the small creek running past, or simply sitting near the fire pit with a hot drink on a cool day. Upon entering the spacious open plan living area you are presented with double doors that open out to the deck giving a feeling of bringing the outdoors in, and the wood lined walls and terra cotta tiles only add to the warmth and charm. A well set out kitchen with new stainless steel dishwasher, electric cooking, walk-in-pantry, overhead cupboards, and ample bench space, has windows at both ends that let in lots of natural light. The home is with fitted with a wood heater and new split system heating /cooling unit to keep temperatures at desired levels. There is also a family bathroom with a full size bath, laundry and separate toilet completing the layout on the first floor.
The solid staircase takes you to the second storey where there are 2 good size bedrooms with carpet, built in robes and large windows, one of them with its own access to a private deck. The master bedroom includes an ensuite with separate shower, large walk in robe and ceiling fan. Behind another door is a spiral staircase taking you to the huge loft running the length of the whole house, making it ideal for an artist, study area or teenage retreat.
This surprising and delightful property is fully fenced, with a wood shed and with some finishing touches would make the perfect getaway, weekender or fulltime residence. A short drive away are the local amenities at Grantville offering Post Office, Chemist, Permanent Doctor, Ambulance Depot, Cafes and more.
Commuting is easy on the dual lane Bass Highway to the larger shopping precincts 25 mins away or to the CBD.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 2049

DUAL LIVING ON A HUGE BLOCK WITH WATER VIEWS!
Offers are invited on this truly unique opportunity! This premiere property is situated on approx 1724 square metres of land (equivalent to three house blocks). Being in an elevated position you enjoy views of Westernport Bay from the expansive home with wrap around verandah.
This is a substantial home on offer which is approx 52 squares under roof line. Entering from the verandah you are greeted by an original timber kitchen with a freestanding gas stove and breakfast bar. A generous meals area with direct access out to the expensive deck and water views. The lounge is open plan and also features sliding doors out to the verandah. Head down the hallway to four large bedrooms with built in robes, linen press, main bathroom with spa bath, separate toilet and large laundry with plenty of storage and direct access to the rear verandah.
Spiral stairs lead you down from the main lounge room to a second living space downstairs. On offer here is an opportunity for separate living accomodation with its own entry, large lounge, meals area and kitchen with freestanding stove. There are an additional two bedrooms with robes and one with built in desk and bench seat. An older style combined bathroom with laundry and separate toilet.
To secure a solid investment, contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection.

Life Really Is a Beach
Here's another example of why Grantville is one of Victoria's best kept secrets. Situated only a short walk to the water and boasting peace and quiet that goes with this sought-after location this home is an ideal investment or a great place to raise your children. The home itself consists of large open plan living area with balcony to relax. Down a few stairs you have 3 bedrooms, Ensuite and WIR to master plus a family bathroom. All this on a 546m2 block so close to water and township.

APPEALING PICTURESQUE COTTAGE!!!
Imagine finding a gorgeous cottage with instant street appeal and only a short stroll to the beach .... You would be pretty lucky yeah!!!!
Up for sale in the growing coastal town of Grantville is this well-kept 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home that will delight upon inspection. The paved driveway, full length verandah and carport make unloading the groceries easy in any weather shading the entrance over summer and keeping you dry in winter. The inviting feature leadlight look front door leads into a large living and meals area with a cosy wood heater and floor to ceiling windows that lets in the natural light to allow for looking over the low maintenance gardens. Step up into the hallway which offers 3 bedrooms , good size master with en suite and a modern family bathroom. Easy care carpet and floating floors add to the appeal making this property an ideal family home. At the other end is an open plan kitchen with electric stovetop, oven and plenty of overhead cupboards, pot drawers and a wide island bench with extra storage and a split-system heating/cooling air conditioner that flows down to the meals area. The kitchen overlooks a fabulous family room which has a space saving European laundry complete with sink and bench ideally tucked away. The family room also has beautiful French doors that open out to a delightful backyard with established plants, paved area with brick bbq perfect for those entertaining days. The property is fully fenced with an extra front area for keeping the children or pets safely in. Only minutes to the local group of shops offering permanent doctor, chemist, ambulance depot, newsagency, bank, cafes, community centre and great playground. There is a v-line and school bus services close by. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway and also approx. 25 minutes to Phillip Island and major shopping centre.
The property is one to inspect if you just want to move in relax and enjoy.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 2010
